column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The decor is the type of bland
column2: corporate "modern Asian" style you see in all these places. My waiter was fine
column3: if not anything to write home about. In short
column4: if you've got a craving for ramen and cash to spare
column5: Jinya isn't a bad choice. I
column7: will probably be taking my business elsewhere from hereon out.
